GSD.description:
net: sfp: fix memory leak in sfp_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.289 by commit 9ec5a97f327a89031fce6cfc3e95543c53936638. For more details please see the references link.
